code: import{useEffect}from"react";import Echo from"laravel-echo";import Pusher from"pusher-js";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{CHANEL}from"../../constants";import config from"../../config";export const ConnectionToSockets=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{id}=useSelector(state=>state.user.user);useEffect(()=>{window.Pusher=Pusher;window.Echo=new Echo({broadcaster:"pusher",key:config.pusher_key,cluster:config.pusher_cluster,forceTLS:true});dispatch({type:CHANEL.CHANGE_USER_CHANEL,payload:window.Echo.channel("User.".concat(id))});},[]);return null;};
